gg_color_hue <- function(n) {
  hues = seq(15, 375, length = n + 1)
  hcl(h = hues, l = 65, c = 100)[1:n]
}

roll_mean_n_by_nofill <- function(x, n_by) {
  roll_mean(x, n = n_by, by = n_by) %>% 
    {.[seq_along(.) %% n_by == 1]}
}
